Articles.Content:
I've been with KSP since .16, but I just registered to the forums! It's awesome here! I made a cinematic and wanted to share it with the community (http://youtu.be/J5KW6K29vx0) so I put it in the Fanworks as 'Special' due to the fact that there was no video/cinematic classification. Was that the right place to put it?

Thanks,

Jacob

Hi! Welcome aboard! :3 I hope you will enjoy your stay.

Watched your cinematic, it's great!
Hello and welcome to the forums! Your cenamatic is really nice. I liked it a lot. As for where to put it I'm not sure. I've never posted a video
Welcome Jacob! Around 30 seconds you forgot to close the GUI and it irritated my ocd, but otherwise, no complaints here!
That's the one glitch in the video that has been driving my OCD crazy, too! I've tried to redo the shot but it just doesn't look right. Oh well!

Welcome to the forums!

I've taken the liberty of moving the other thread to the "Live from Mission Control!" subforum, since that's where threads for videos, video series, and livestream showcases go (much like "Mission Reports" is for written mission reports). No harm, no foul
Not bad work, sir! One question... How do you get the camera to move like that? I think I might have to try now!
Welcome aboard jacob, I have never seen anyone use a different font before, until now that is!
Thanks! I was wondering how that moved!

Nice cinematic! That's one way to make an entrance. Just a protip: try not to use comic sans, especially in your videos (I know that you didn't, it's just advice). I saw that you used it at the end of the post, but I'd just like to say that it's typographically... I'm not sure how to put it other than unprofessional/unattractive. I'd like to see more of this, did you study photography or something similar? You seem to know your stuff. I've subbed
